headline: 5 Insightful Analyst Questions From PTC’s Q3 Earnings Call
summary: PTC’s third quarter delivered revenue and non-GAAP profit meaningfully above Wall Street expectations, but the market responded negatively, reflecting concerns addressed by management on the call. CEO Neil Barua pointed to strong execution around large strategic deals and early benefits from a new go-to-market approach, with multiproduct adoption across industries. The quarter also included the announcement of a definitive agreement to divest the Kepware and ThingWorx businesses, a move designed
